ConVars.DefaultValue: ${var locals = getstackinfos(3).locals;var s; if(lastFlyout.victim == locals.victim  && Time() - lastFlyout.damageTime < 3){s = locals.summedDamage + locals.damage}else{s = locals.damage};; return s.tostring()} DMG
ConVars.Name: elab_title_macro

ConVars.DefaultValue: ${var locals = getstackinfos(3).locals; var totalhealth = locals.victim.GetHealth() - locals.damage;return (totalhealth < 0 ? 0 : totalhealth / locals.victim.GetMaxHealth() * 100).tostring()}% HP
ConVars.Name: elab_desc_macro

Description: Creates a customizable interface that displays how much damage has been dealt.
Name: Odd.DamageFlyout
